mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (user_id, email, password, income_bracket, gpa, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{email}, #{password}, #{incomeBracket}, #{gpa}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email AS email, password AS password, income_bracket AS incomeBracket, gpa AS gpa, created_at AS createdAt FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password = #{password}, email = #{email}, income_bracket = #{incomeBracket}, gpa = #{gpa} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
